entry.title: test
entry.content:
连续性方程

  • 气相连续性方程

    $ rac{\partial}{\partial t}\left(f \varepsilon_{g c} ho_{g} ight)+ abla \cdot\left(f \varepsilon_{g c} ho_{g} \mathbf{u}{g c} ight)=\Gamma{g}$
    $$
    rac{\partial}{\partial t}\left(f \varepsilon_{g c} ho_{g} ight)+ abla \cdot\left(f \varepsilon_{g c} ho_{g} \mathbf{u}{g c} ight)=\Gamma{g}
    $$

$$
\Gamma_{g}=- rac{1}{V} \int_{A_{i}} \dot{m}_{g c}^{ ullet} d A
$$

  • 固相连续性方程
    $$
    rac{\partial}{\partial t}\left(f \varepsilon_{s c} ho_{s} ight)+ abla \cdot\left(f \varepsilon_{s c} ho_{s} \mathbf{u}{s c} ight)=\Gamma{s}
    $$

    $$
    \Gamma_{s}=- rac{1}{V} \int_{A_{i}} \dot{m_{s c}} d A
    $$

$$
rac{\partial}{\partial t}\left(f \varepsilon_{g c} ho_{g} \mathbf{u}{g c} ight)+ abla \cdot\left(f \varepsilon{g e} ho_{g} \mathbf{u}{g c} \mathbf{u}{g e} ight)=-f abla p+ abla \cdot\left(f au_{g e} ight)+f ho_{g} \mathbf{g}-f \mathbf{F}{d c}+\Gamma{g} \mathbf{u}_{g}^{i}
$$

汇报

  • 湍流强度
    $$
    I= rac{\sqrt{\overline{u^{\prime 2}+\overline{v^{\prime 2}}+\overline{w^{\prime 2}}}}}{U}=0.16 imes R e^{- rac{1}{8}}
    $$

  • 涡量
    $$
    oldsymbol{\Omega}= oldsymbol{ abla} imes oldsymbol{U}
    $$

  • 气相雷诺数
    $$
    \operatorname{Re}{\mathrm{g}}= rac{U L}{v{\mathrm{g}}}
    $$

  • 沙相雷诺数
    $$
    \mathrm{Re}{\mathrm{s}}= rac{d{\mathrm{s}}\left|U_{\mathrm{s}}-U_{\mathrm{g}} ight|}{v_{\mathrm{g}}}
    $$

  • 沙相斯托克斯数
    $$
    \mathrm{St}= rac{U au_{\mathrm{s}}}{L}= rac{ ho_{\mathrm{s}} d_{\mathrm{s}}^{2} U}{18 ho_{\mathrm{g}} v_{\mathrm{g}} L}
    $$

$$
rac{\partial f}{\partial t}+ oldsymbol{v} \cdot rac{\partial f}{\partial oldsymbol{x}}=- rac{1}{ au}\left(f-f^{\mathrm{eq}} ight)
$$

$$
rac{\partial f_{i}}{\partial t}+ oldsymbol{v}{i} \cdot rac{\partial f{i}}{\partial oldsymbol{x}}=- rac{1}{ au}\left(f_{i}-f_{i}^{\mathrm{eq}} ight)
$$

entry.title: My first post
entry.content:
关于

本博客使用Github与Hexo搭建，使用hexo-theme-fluid。

支持valine评论。

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
